QuestData.Title: What is Worth Fighting For
QuestData.Description: Dear $p,$b$bYou have recovered the story of our people's freedom from the mogu empire.$b$bIf you visit us at the Seat of Knowledge in Vale of Eternal Blossoms we can add this contribution to your personal collection.$b$bThank you for your diligence!$b$bSincerely,$b$bLorewalker Cho
QuestData.LogDescription: Bring What is Worth Fighting For to Lorewalker Cho at the Seat of Knowledge.
QuestData.QuestCompletionLog: Speak with Lorewalker Cho at the Seat of Kowledge in the Vale of Eternal Blossoms.
